resources.string: The game where you can test your KNOWLEDGE on where U.S. cities are!!
Select the button below to begin your quiz:
This application is designed to test your knowledge of U.S. states. Every Quiz will be 6 questions long, try and get a perfect score!
Once youve started your quiz, select which of the 3 answers you think is correct and swipe left to move on to the next question
You can swipe right to return to your previous question if you change your mind
Select "Past Quizzes" in the menu to view your quiz history
